Legal_Rule: A certificate filed under subsection 223(2) certifies tax debt; ownership disputes require proof by the claimant.
Burden_of_Proof: On the claimant (Mr. Stickle) to prove non-ownership
Procedural_Stage: Hearing on ownership and valuation of seized assets
Applicable_Process: Court hearing based on evidence and witness testimony

Credibility_Factor: Mr. Stickle failed to provide sufficient evidence for non-ownership
Defendant_Response: Mr. Stickle claimed he did not own several seized items
Claimant_Status: Mr. Stickle as claimant disputing ownership
Grounds_for_Claim: Assertion of non-ownership of seized property
Outcome_on_Merits: Most assets declared as Mr. Stickle's property; Virago motorcycle excluded
Court_Result: Most assets confirmed as Mr. Stickle's; CCRA assigned costs for returning the Virago

Outcome: Unpaid taxes led to asset seizure; partial return of property ordered
